name: Lightning Aviation
about: Lightning Aviation, located in Foley, Alabama, is a premier flight training institution with over ten years of success in the aviation industry. As the Gulf Coast's leading flight training destination, we offer a comprehensive range of certifications including Private Pilot, Commercial, Flight Instructor (CFI), and Flight Instructor Instrument (CFII). Our services also include discovery flights, allowing individuals to experience the Gulf Coast from a new perspective. With a focus on safety and excellence, Lightning Aviation provides top-notch flight instruction, aviation services, and aircraft repairs. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive the highest quality training to launch their aviation careers. Whether you're a novice or an experienced pilot, Lightning Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your flying goals.
